name: Juan Ruiz
summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying web applications and AI-powered solutions in retail, insurance, logistics, and enterprise systems. Proficient in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Python/FastAPI, and integrating LLMs, NLP models, and AI pipelines for automation and predictive analytics. Skilled in RESTful and GraphQL API design, microservices architecture, database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and cloud deployments (AWS, Azure). Strong expertise in unit and integration testing (Jest, PyTest, Supertest), performance optimization, CI/CD, and DevOps practices. Experienced in Agile environments, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, maintainable, and high-performance applications.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Led development of scalable web applications using React.js and Next.js, delivering responsive, dynamic interfaces for complex business workflows and customer-facing platforms.

Architected and implemented backend services in Node.js and Python (FastAPI), integrating AI-driven solutions, including LLMs and NLP models, to automate content personalization and enhance decision-making.
Designed and optimized database schemas and queries in PostgreSQL and MongoDB, ensuring efficient data retrieval and supporting high-volume transactional and analytical workloads.
Implemented comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using Jest, Supertest, and PyTest, improving reliability and reducing production issues by over 35%.
Enhanced application performance through profiling, caching strategies, and CDN optimization, reducing page load times and API response latency by 40% across multiple modules.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including product, design, and data science to define API contracts, streamline data pipelines, and ensure cohesive integration of AI models and services.
Integrated external APIs and third-party services for analytics, notifications, and operational insights, improving platform capabilities and enabling predictive decision-making.
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and contributed to CI/CD pipeline improvements, fostering best practices in version control, automated testing, and deployment workflows.
